SHORT_DESCR.P: Alteration, recladding and insertion of new roller shutters to an existing asbestos clad steel framed structure of 1250 m2.
New internal sunken pit section forming bus maintenance area and deepening of the existing pits.
New drainage connections New internal structures with two storey storage areas of 535 m2 of ground floor and 295 m2 at first floor level.
New external bus chassis wash structure and associated civil works.
Construction of a new mezzanine level and alterations of a storage building.
New sprinkler and pumped hydrant system including new water tanks and pump houses. The sprinkler and hydrants will be a novated element.
Removal of existing slate roof, approx. 4400 m2 and reinstatement of new.
Repair of existing timber roof trusses using conservation methods.
Installation of new natural slate, lead, patent glazing and zinc roof materials to 4400 m2 in addition to the new insulted cladding to the roof of 1250 m2.
1. Alteration, recladding and insertion of new roller shutters to an existing asbestos clad steel framed structure of 1250 m2.
2. New internal sunken pit section forming bus maintenance area and deepening of the existing pits.
3. New drainage connections and associated site works.
4. New internal structures consisting of single and two storey accommodation and storage areas of 535 m2 of ground floor and 295 m2 at first floor level.
5. New Mechanical and Electrical installations in all areas.
6. New external bus chassis wash structure and associated civil works
7. Construction of a new mezzanine level and alterations of a storage building.
8. New sprinkler and pumped hydrant system including new water tanks and pump houses.The sprinkler and hydrants will be a novated element.
9. Removal of existing slate roof, approx. 4400 m2 and reinstatement of new.
10. Repair of existing timber roof trusses using conservation methods.
11. Removal of internal vegetation and debris.
12. Installation of new natural slate, lead, patent glazing and zinc roof materials to 4400 m2 in addition to the new insulted cladding to the roof of 1250 m2.

The building is a protected structure bus garage and parking yard. The contractor will have a site hoarding to separate the site form the activities. The main contractor will be appointed as PSCS and be fully responsible for all traffic management measures required for access and egress.

The building is with the curtilage of protected structures, the contractor shall demonstrate previous experience of working on protected or historic buildings with traditional materials and suitable experience of installation of mechanical and electrical equipment of a similar nature. Submissions are to be on etenders and two physical copies are to be sent to Dublin Bus.
